4301160.name: Curse Chapter: Dawnthief Demo
4301160.description:
Travel north into the wilderness with your team to undermine diplomatic relations and steal the rumored treasures sealed away there. Overcome local fauna, wild hearthen warriors and even elite knights posted to protect all that is hidden away in this mystic overgrown land. Here under the shade of the great soul tree much waits to be uncovered all for you to steal it. Venture forth Dawnthief and take the greatest treasure of the worlds tyrant.

Play as the enigmatic and quiet Dawn Clown and work with your team to find all worth taking in the hearthen wilderness. Take advantage of your acrobatic skill and sling your chain mace to reach great heights and places no mere mortal should find. Plunder your way through worlds made up of levels and capped off with a duel styled boss fight against the hopeful heros rising up in your way. Pick your favorite side arm, collect a wild array of throwable object to jump, kick, throw and smash your way through!

  • Acrobatically fling yourself through 6 worlds

  • Master your favorite of 3 side arms to defeat your foes

  • Uncover secrets, plunder treasure and find the rumored greatest of all treasures.

  • Take breaks to meet your team, change your loadout or maybe just a spot of fishing.

  • Master your banditry in a once in a lifetime whimsical experience in the wilds of the world.
4301160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
